AxMacroDictionary.Name: VendRequest
AxMacroDictionary.Source: #DEFINE.VendRequestNVJTemplate('VendRequestNVJTemplate') #DEFINE.VendRequestNVATemplate('VendRequestNVATemplate') #DEFINE.VendRequestUserTemplate('VendRequestUserTemplate') #DEFINE.vendRequestCategoryNCJTemplate('VendRequestCategoryNCJTemplate') #DEFINE.VendRequestCategoryNCATemplate('VendRequestCategoryNCATemplate') #DEFINE.VendRequestStatusChangeAddEdit('VendRequestStatusChangeAddEdit') #DEFINE.VendRequestStatusChangeTemplate('VendRequestStatusChangeTemplate') #DEFINE.UseVendParty('VendParty') #DEFINE.UseContactParty('ContactParty') // CustTable branch ID from the DirPartyView view (based on the DirQuery query) #DEFINE.CustomerDirPartyViewBranchID(1) // VendTable branch ID #DEFINE.VendorDirPartyViewBranchID(2) // smmBusRelTable branch ID #DEFINE.BusinessRelationDirPartyViewBranchID(3)
